title: South Canterbury
creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit and Soil Conservation and Rivers Control Council
brief_description: Shows problems of floods, and soil erosion in one catchment area. Explains how public authorities brought the rivers under control, and took measures for soil conservation.
